Package Models

Class GamePlayPhase

java.lang.Object
Models.GamePlayPhase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartUpPhase
public abstract class GamePlayPhase extends Object implements Serializable
This abstract class lists the methods required for all game phases.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel
See Also:

      A constructor for initializing the current game engine's value.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngineCtx - Instance of the game engine used to update the state.
      p_gameState - The current game state associated with the game engine instance.
